document_data.name: Imrar Roaryl
document_data.mainbody: '''Imrar Roaryl''' was the Crown Prince of [[Eskorn]], [[Laerakond]], as of [[1479 DR]]. He was a member of the  [[Clan Roaryl|Roaryl]] dynasty.
document_data.Personality: Imrar was a hotheaded, proud, and capable warrior who underestimated his younger siblings.
document_data.Background: As of 1479 DR, Prince Imrar was the heir of Eskorn's throne.
document_data.Relationships: Crown Prince Imrar was the older son of King [[Ornan Roaryl]], and the elder brother of [[Flandarr Roaryl|Flandarr]] and [[Dlorna Roaryl]].
